WP.message: New Dawn extras by [color=#FF00FF][i][b]Sunan[/b][/i][/color]\nClick next to start
Get the stuff from the table
Use PC and type "Foulfellow and Gideon"
Run over to the server room
Use PC in server room\nType "Foulfellow and Gideon"
Grab keycard from manager"s desk.\nYou"ll need to wait until she is out of the office to grab it.
Back to the locked door (terminal D) and into instance

Get to terminal D3 and disable the cameras.
Tips:
Stand still and the sentry drones will pass by you (they detect movement).
The buttons next to the doors make the mobs dissapear.
Teleport out to New Dawn and talk to Che to complete quest [color=#578c82][b][u]Foulfellow and Gideon[/u][/b][/color].
Finish quest [color=#578c82][b][u]One Flew Over[/u][/b][/color].\nComputer pass: sacrilege
